item.description: April found me only in my home gym for indoor climbing, but also the first outside day for 2024!

item.description: March took me to five different gyms! For a total of 175 climbs across 13 climbing days.

item.title: About Me
item.description: I began my career as an in-home childcare provider in 2013.

item.title: Childcare Philosophy
item.description: The keystone to my style of looking after children is the fact that in order to learn and grow, it is a requirement for children to feel safe exploring the world around them and not fear making mistakes.

item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: What childcare experience do you have? I have been an in-home childcare provider since 2013.

item.title: Portfolio
item.description: Portfolio Documents Here, you can access different documents that make up my job search portfolio, including “About You” - an overview of what I am looking for in a role.
